mapper.insert: INSERT INTO room (num, room_name, room_price, room_structure, room_size, room_people, room_items, bedroom_type, room_introduce, img_path) VALUES(#{num}, #{room_name}, #{room_price}, #{room_structure}, #{room_size}, #{room_people}, #{room_items}, #{bedroom_type}, #{room_introduce}, #{img_path})
mapper.select: SELECT num, room_name, room_price, room_structure, room_size, room_people, room_items, bedroom_type, room_introduce, img_path FROM room ORDER BY num DESC
